title: I'm in Love with the Villainess
description: Ordinary office worker Rei Oohashi wakes up in the body of the protagonist of her favorite otome game, Revolution. To her delight, the first person to greet her is also her favorite character, Claire Francoisâ€”the main antagonist of the story! Now, Rei is determined to romance Claire instead of the game's male leads. But how will her villainous ladylove react to this new courtship?!

episodes.title: Rushing Headlong into Life in Another World
A Maid's Job Is a Labor of Love
My Love Is a Series of Ups and Downs
